DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: Here I am... for the last time.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: I’d even say I don’t want you to leave this world.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: But we had an agreement, and under it, I cannot let you live if you don’t create the Heart of Creation.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: I won’t trouble you any longer. Farewell.
